newest.message:
# Release v4.0.19
## New Features - Manage Plans window now shows the matching character name in the title bar
## Bug Fixes - Auto-Updater now uses the correct URL after GitHub migration of branch names due to the United States Black Lives Matter movement - Remove outdated and nonfunctional EVE Gate support - Logitech G15 support re-enabled as it apparently is still functional on newer models of keyboards
## Contributors - Peter Han - NevarrTivianne

release.message:
# Release v4.0.20
## New Features - Skill injector requirements in the Skill Planner now include an estimate of the cost in the tooltip text
## Bug Fixes - Manual workaround for missing skill information on new Fleet skills from SDE - Fix a potential race condition in asset lookup - Greatly improve speed of asset price lookups, and add Fuzzworks Market as an available provider
## Contributors - Peter Han - NevarrTivianne
